name: Hit the Dirt!
summary: You fling yourself out of harm's way.
description:
You fling yourself out of harm's way. You Leap. Your movement gives you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. Regardless of whether or not the triggering attack hits, you land prone after completing your Leap.Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.Hit the Dirt! Leads To...Leap and Fire
trigger: A creature you can see attempts a ranged Strike against you.
